--- DateTime: 2019-09-26 16:00
---

--- @param data PsBattleSoldierDetailInfo
function init(self, data)
    -- local soldierId = "10002"
    -- local meta = CS.SoldierMeta.GetMeta(soldierId)

    if data == nil then
        return;
    end

    local soldierId = data.SoldierMetaId;
    local meta = CS.SoldierMeta.GetMeta(soldierId)

    if meta ~= nil then
        -- body
        self.soldierIcon.spriteName = meta.iconAsset;
        self.soldierIcon:MakePixelPerfect();
        self.lv.spriteName = CS.SoldierUtils.GetSoldierLevelIcon(meta.era);
        self.bg.spriteName = meta.iconQuality;
    end
    
    self.lable1.text = tostring(data.Count);
    self.lable2.text = tostring(data.Kill);
    self.lable3.text = tostring(data.Death);
    self.lable4.text = tostring(data.SeriousInjury);
    self.lable5.text = tostring(data.MinorInjury);
end 

function showLine(self, show)
    -- body
    self.line:SetActive(show)
end
